description.full: - Rock Any Way You Want!   - Rock out with any combination of instruments. - Drop in and drop out of songs with the click of a button in the All-New Party Play Mode. - Create your own music with ease, in the all-new and improved Music Studio. - Compete with friends locally or online in the new RockFest. - Play over 80 songs from an all-new setlist and save personal playlists. - Import your Guitar Hero® World Tour Downloadable Content straight into Guitar Hero® 5. *Does not apply to a limited number of songs.
